configurations.name: sdsm_producer_topic
configurations.description: Kafka topic to which the sensor data sharing service will produce SDSMs.

configurations.name: detection_consumer_topic
configurations.description: Kafka topic from which the sensor data sharing service will consume Detected Objects.

configurations.name: sensor_configuration_file_path
configurations.description: Path to sensor configuration information that includes sensor location and orientation.

configurations.name: sensor_id
configurations.description: Unique id of sensor for which to publish SDSMS

configurations.name: sdsm_geo_reference
configurations.description: Geo reference used for reference frame for Sensor Data Sharing messges broadcast
